{"id":552679025,"lang":"java","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1631292735,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"72 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/552679025/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of Distinct Islands","memory":"106.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int numDistinctIslands(int[][] grid) {\n        if (grid == null || grid.length == 0)\n            return 0;\n        int m = grid.length, n = grid[0].length;\n        Set<String> paths = new HashSet<>();\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n            for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n                if (grid[i][j] == 1) {\n                    paths.add(computePath(grid, i, j, m, n, \"X\"));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return paths.size();\n    }\n    \n    private String computePath(int[][] grid, int i, int j, int m ,int n, String direction) {\n        if (i < 0 || j < 0 || i >= m || j >= n || grid[i][j] == 0) {\n            return \"O\";\n        }\n        grid[i][j] = 0;\n        return new StringBuilder().append(direction)\n            .append(computePath(grid, i - 1, j, m, n, \"L\"))\n            .append(computePath(grid, i + 1, j, m, n, \"R\"))\n            .append(computePath(grid, i, j - 1, m, n, \"U\"))\n            .append(computePath(grid, i, j + 1, m, n, \"D\")).toString();\n            \n    }\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-distinct-islands"}
